column2: I don't know what luck I had coming here when I did because my partner and I got seated right away
column4: around 5 pm on a Saturday! There is always a great debate as to which place has the best deep dish in the city. In my opinion
column5: Lou's classic deep dish is just the perfect melange of cheese
column8: and a delicious buttery crust. The buttery crust seems to be a point of contention but I would say that it is what makes Lou's better than the rest.
